text: Lheueh nyan Meugantoe sosah ngon seunang Aneuk deungon nang ka le mautamah ; Le aneuk cuco lom le hareuta í Han ek takira meulimpah ruah Teuma jikheun treuk ayah-ayah kamoe Dilee phon meunoe meularat leupah Teuma jeuet seunang laju meugantoe ‘Ohban jikheun nyoe troh le musibah Kamoe hukom jih ngon tiba-tiba Abeh binasa rijang sileupah Hana jithee-thee bala troh keunan
